ingredients:
ice,50ml vodka
25ml peach schnapps
2 oranges, juiced, plus 2 slices to garnish
50ml cranberry juice
glace cherries, to garnish (optional)
preparation:
Fill two tall glasses with ice cubes. Pour the vodka, peach schnapps and fruit juices into a large jug and stir.
Divide the mixture between the two glasses and stir gently to combine.
 Garnish with the cocktail cherries and orange slices.

ingredients: rum, suger, zesty lime and cooling soda water
preparation: Mix together ingredients for a winning drink no one will turn down. Devide the mixture between the two glasses, and have fun. Dring at least two glass for better mood. Keep away from childred
